import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-common-popup', templateUrl: './common-popup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./common-popup.component.scss'] }) export class CommonPopupComponent { warningName:string = 'Remove User'; accountName:string = 'Anuja kumari'; detailsList=[ {id : 1, content : "Access any Projects related to this Account"}, {id : 2, content : "Any Personal Data Synced with this Account"} ] buttonName:string = 'Remove User'; }
